availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. Hobgood (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer and surveyor )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and surveyor. North Carolina native. Married to Sarah Hobgood. Married to Lucy Ann Veazey in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on August 8, 1861. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1850. Surveyor in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 138B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 649.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 476.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Marriages.
